item.title: Natixis 为 15 亿美元私人信贷基金寻找合作伙伴
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国 Natixis SA 公司正在商谈设立一个规模约为 15 亿美元的直接借贷基金，这将使该公司能够购买这类资产。【原文：France’s Natixis SA is in talks to set up a direct lending fund of around $1.5 billion, which would allow it to buy into the asset class, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特航空公司 Flynas 将首次公开募股价格定在区间上限
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 Flynas 公司将其首次公开发行股票的价格定在了区间的高端，这表明随着全球市场动荡的缓解，海湾地区的上市需求仍在持续。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Flynas Co. set the price for its initial public offering at the top end of the range, showing continued demand for Gulf listings as global market turmoil eases.】

item.title: 制糖业一直在躲避小肯尼迪的健康运动— 直到现在
item.description: 食糖生产商以为他们逃过了小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Sugar producers thought they had escaped Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s Make America Healthy Again agenda.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司接近以 45 亿美元收购无线电制造商 Silvus
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩托罗拉解决方案公司（Motorola Solutions Inc.【原文：Motorola Solutions Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire closely held wireless-radio maker Silvus Technologies for around $4.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 梅洛尼期待穆迪最终结束意大利濒临破产的状态
item.description: 还有两天，意大利就有机会摆脱笼罩在乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）首相头衔上的近乎垃圾的地位。【原文：Italy is just two days away from the chance to start shaking off the near-junk status that has hung over Giorgia Meloni’s premiership.】

item.title: 比亚迪在欧洲推出售价 2.3 万欧元的掀背车，争夺更便宜的电动车市场
item.description: 比亚迪公司（BYD Co., Ltd.）在欧洲推出了 Dolphin Surf，这是一款全电动掀背车，售价不到 23,000 欧元（约合 26,100 美元）。【原文：BYD Co. is raising the stakes in Europe’s race for cheaper electric vehicles with the European launch of the Dolphin Surf, a fully-electric hatchback that will sell for less than €23,000 ($26,100).】

item.title: 雪佛龙在安哥拉平台火灾后搜寻失踪工人
item.description: 安哥拉一个深水石油平台发生火灾后，雪佛龙公司和当地政府正在寻找一名失踪的工人。【原文：Chevron Corp. and local authorities in Angola are searching for a missing worker after a fire broke out on a deep water oil platform.】

item.title: 南非最新预算尝试中的赢家和输家
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）周三在开普敦向立法者提交了第三版国家预算，此前数月一直在为增税问题争论不休。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana presented a third version of the national budget to lawmakers in Cape Town on Wednesday after months of wrangling over tax increases.】

item.title: 南非财政部长修改后的预算要点
item.description: 以下是南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）周三在开普敦宣布的南非 2025 年第三版预算的要点，此前两版预算因执政联盟内部在税收问题上存在分歧而被撤回。【原文：Below are the highlights of South Africa’s third iteration of the 2025 budget announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Cape Town on Wednesday, after two previous versions were withdrawn because of disagreements within the governing coalition over taxes.】

item.title: 并非每支球队都值得制作 Netflix 体育纪录片
item.description:
客户对它们爱不释手，但流媒体用户在答应什么方面却越来越挑剔。【原文：

Customers love them, but streamers are getting choosier in what they say yes to.

】

item.title: 米莱的削减让阿根廷人开上了挂纸牌的新车
item.description: 玛丽拉-梅勒赫（Mariela Mailhe）在阿根廷最繁华的街区之一销售进口汽车。这些汽车配备电子调节真皮座椅和全景天窗，但部分由于哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）的紧缩政策，这些汽车都是挂着纸质车牌从停车场开出来的。【原文：Mariela Mailhe sells imported cars in one of Argentina’s flashiest neighborhoods. They come with electronically adjustable leather seats and panoramic sunroofs, but thanks in part to Javier Milei’s austerity campaign they roll off the lot with paper license plates.】

item.title: 卡塔尔在波音巨型飞机交易后表示未来有望订购空客喷气机
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways）在宣布向波音公司（Boeing Co., Ltd.）订购大型远程喷气式飞机几天后表示，未来仍有可能向空中客车公司（Airbus SE）购买宽体飞机。【原文：Qatar Airways said it could still buy widebody aircraft from Airbus SE in the future, days after it announced a mega order for long-haul jets by Boeing Co.】

item.title: 姆努钦称美国预算赤字比贸易赤字更令人担忧
item.description: 美国前财政部长史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）表示，与贸易失衡相比，他更担心美国不断增长的预算赤字，并敦促华盛顿优先考虑财政修复。【原文：Former United States Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said he’s more alarmed by the country’s growing budget deficit than its trade imbalances, and urged Washington to prioritize fiscal repair.】

item.title: 尽管面临 "购买加拿大 "的压力，加拿大养老基金仍将资金投入美国市场
item.description: 由于加拿大国家养老基金的管理者们顶住了来自加拿大商界的压力，加大了对国内的投资力度，美国资产已飙升至加拿大国家养老基金的近一半。【原文：US assets have surged to become nearly half of Canada’s national pension fund, as its managers defy pressure from within the country’s business community to invest more domestically.】

item.title: 如果政策更加确定，RWE 首席执行官可能会将美国项目增加一倍
item.description: 德国能源公司 RWE AG 表示，如果政策更加确定，该公司计划在美国的投资项目可能会增加一倍。【原文：German energy company RWE AG said it could double its planned investment projects in the US, if there was greater policy certainty.】

item.title: 小特朗普说 "也许有一天 "他会寻求继承父业
item.description: 小唐纳德-特朗普暗示，他可能会竞选政治职位，并试图接替父亲成为美国总统。【原文：Donald Trump Jr. hinted that he may run for political office and try to succeed his father as US president.】

item.title: 卡塔尔巨额液化天然气赌注遭遇美国野心
item.description:
海湾国家将从耗资数十亿美元的新设施中开始出口，而此时特朗普正在推动国内建设。【原文：

The Gulf nation will start exporting from new multibillion-dollar facilities just as Trump pushes for a domestic buildup.

】

item.title: 约翰逊称已就提高 40,000 美元盐税上限达成协议
item.description: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）表示，共和党人已就将州和地方税减免额提高至 4 万美元达成协议，这意味着阻碍唐纳德-特朗普总统经济法案的最后一个问题得到解决。【原文：House Speaker Mike Johnson said Republicans have reached an agreement to increase the state and local tax deduction to $40,000, suggesting a resolution to one of the final issues holding up President Donald Trump’s economic bill.】

item.title: OpenAI 的 "星际之门 "项目给德克萨斯州西部小镇带来了希望和疑问
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth（深度科技），这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，张慧卿（Emily Chang）将前往西德克萨斯平原，报道那里正在成形的星际之门人工智能 "巨型工厂"。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Emily Chang travels to the plains of West Texas to report on the Stargate AI “megafactory” taking shape there.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯认为通胀目标宜早不宜迟
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，在欧元走强和能源成本下降的帮助下，欧洲中央银行距离实现 2% 的通胀目标并不遥远。【原文：The European Central Bank isn’t far from achieving its 2% inflation target, helped by a stronger euro and falling energy costs, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 美国巨头公司急于向欧洲借钱
item.description:
今年售出的所谓反向扬基交易数量创下历史新高，这是美国主导的企业债务市场可能发生持久转变的早期迹象。【原文：

A record number of so-called reverse Yankee deals have been sold this year, an early sign of a possible lasting shift in the US-dominated corporate debt market. 

】

item.title: 中国出口商急于满足美国进口需求
item.description: 上周，中美贸易休战立即引发了世界上最重要的贸易路线之一的复兴，广东的供应链经理陈磊走在了前列。【原文：The US-China trade truce last week sparked an immediate revival along one of the world’s most important trade routes, and Guangdong-based supply chain manager Chen Lei was at the forefront.】

item.description: 今年 2 月，CFRA 的佩奇-迈耶（Paige Meyer）对联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：When CFRA’s Paige Meyer slapped a “sell” rating on UnitedHealth Group Inc. in February, she was the lone analyst out of 30 tracked by Bloomberg with a negative view of the company.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率升至三个月高点，房屋需求放缓
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周攀升至三个月高点，导致购房和再融资申请量下滑。【原文：US mortgage rates climbed last week to a three-month high, prompting a slide in applications for home purchases and refinancing.】

item.title: 南非集团请求法院裁定《征用法》违宪
item.description: 在西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）总统和美国领导人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）举行会谈并可能讨论该法律之前的几个小时，南非人权组织 Afriforum 正在对一项允许无偿征用财产的法律的合宪性提出质疑。【原文：South African rights group Afriforum is challenging the constitutionality of a law that will allow for expropriation of property without compensation, hours before President Cyril Ramaphosa and US leader Donald Trump hold talks where they may discuss the legislation.】

item.title: 美敦力面临关税带来的 2 亿美元冲击，业绩未达预期
item.description: 美敦力公司（Medtronic PLC）预计其出口产品将受到至少 2 亿美元的关税影响，并发布了低于预期的每股收益展望。【原文：Medtronic PLC is expecting at least $200 million impact from tariffs on its exports, and issued lower-than-expected earnings per share outlook.】

item.title: 对冲基金创始人德国税务欺诈洗钱指控被撤销
item.description: 对冲基金创始人桑杰-沙阿（Sanjay Shah）在一起 3.3 亿欧元（约合 3.74 亿美元）的案件中被指控洗钱，但在丹麦的一起类似起诉中被定罪后，德国撤销了对他的指控。【原文：German money laundering charges against hedge fund founder Sanjay Shah in a €330 million ($374 million) case were dropped after his conviction in a similar Danish prosecution.】

item.title: 印度短期债券因有望获得创纪录的印度央行红利而反弹
item.description: 由于预期印度央行将在本周晚些时候派发丰厚的股息，政府借贷成本在一次债券拍卖中降至三年来的最低点。【原文：Shorter-tenor Indian bonds are leading a rally, with the government borrowing costs dropping to a three-year low at a bill auction on expectations of a bumper dividend payout from the central bank later this week.】

item.title: 中央银行维持利率不变，半数土耳其企业陷入亏损
item.description: 随着借贷成本接近 50%，对经济硬着陆的担忧与日俱增，曾经支持央行回归正统货币政策的土耳其公司现在普遍报告亏损。【原文：Turkish companies that once backed the central bank’s return to orthodox monetary policy are now reporting widespread losses, as borrowing costs near 50% and fears of a hard landing grow.】
